days.title: Share the Love Garden Raises 3000 lbs of Food.
days.description: At its corporate headquarters in New Jersey, Subaru creates the Share the Love Garden, an employee community garden designed to support environmental issues and the community. In its first year, nearly 3,200 pounds of food and crops were harvested and sent to the Food Bank of South Jersey.
days.shortdesc: Subaru creates the Share the Love Garden, raising over 3000 pounds of food for area food bank.

days.title: EPA Award for Community Involvement
days.description: The Environmental Protection Agency honors Subaru with the Wastewise Gold Achievement Award for Community Involvement.
days.shortdesc: The Environmental Protection Agency honors Subaru with the Wastewise Gold Achievement Award for Community Involvement.
